title: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
OB: When changing the attached source of a jar in Build 20020416, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired. However, this is incorrect behavior. As a result, the user interface closes the class file editors that are open for this jar. Closing the class file editors is the correct action for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta, but not for this case. I attempted to fix the delta to be an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, but the user interface did not react as expected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open Build 20020416.
2. Change the attached source of a jar.
3. Observe that a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired and the user interface closes the class file editors for the jar, even though it should react differently for an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
